% \one column   ?
\section{PSB galaxy sample properties}
\label{sec:lists-of-psbs}
Here we list pertinent NASA Sloan Atlas properties of the selected 31 central-type (CPSB) and 37 ring-type (RPSB) post starburst galaxies featured in this study. These PSB samples, and corresponding control samples, were provided by Chen et al. 2019 (submitted).

\begin{table}
\caption[Post-starburst galaxy sample : central-type (CPSBs)]{Listing of central-type PSBs identified in SDSS MaNGA MPL-6 by Chen et al. (2019, submitted). Galaxy properties obtained from the MaNGA \texttt{drpAll} v.2.4.3.}
\label{tab:my-CPSBs}
\begin{tabular}{lccccc}
\hline
PlateIFU & RA & dec & z & log & S\'ersic\\
& & & & $M_*$ & n \\
\hline
